properties.entry: SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , USER_NICKNAME "NOTICE_WRITER" , TO_CHAR(NOTICE_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') "NOTICE_CREATE_DATE" , NOTICE_TYPE , NOTICE_STATUS , NOTICE_RECEIVER_NO FROM TB_NOTICE JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (USER_NO = NOTICE_WRITER)

SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , USER_NICKNAME "NOTICE_WRITER" , TO_CHAR(NOTICE_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') "NOTICE_CREATE_DATE" , NOTICE_TYPE , NOTICE_STATUS , NOTICE_RECEIVER_NO FROM TB_NOTICE JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (USER_NO = NOTICE_WRITER) WHERE NOTICE_TYPE = ?
